txt.en: Many of the foul Kergrim appear to have infested the valley in which the tombs of the ancient DÃºnedain kings can be found. No doubt the Rangers of the North are enraged by the potential desecration of their ancestors' tombs by these beasts, but they can spare few men to root them out.

Your efforts to destroy the Kergrim infesting Evendim have been fruitful, but some of the beasts persist in the area. With luck, the Rangers charged with guarding these lands will be able to eliminate the remaining Kergrim in due time.
